title: Full-Stack Web Development
description: I build responsive and dynamic web applications using React.js, Node.js, and modern JavaScript. Experienced in developing full-stack solutions with MongoDB, Firebase, and RESTful APIs through academic and personal projects, with a focus on clean code and usability.

title: AI-Driven Web Features
description: I integrate AI and machine learning features into web applications using Python, TensorFlow, FastAPI, and Stable Diffusion. Hands-on experience through academic projects involving model training, API integration, and AI-powered branding tools.

title: UI / UX Design
description: I design clean and user-friendly interfaces using Figma and Adobe XD, focusing on responsive layouts, accessibility, and modern UI principles. My goal is to create interfaces that are intuitive, visually appealing, and easy to use.
